name: BestBuy Products
special_instructions: maxProductsCnt is the maximum number of products to be scraped. Few (2-3) product in progress might be scraped above this limit
addImages is a boolean field. If set to true, links to HD images of each product will be added
addTopReviews is a boolean field. If set to true, recommended reviews will be added
maxRequestRetries indicates how many times the request is retried
minConcurrency sets the minimum concurrency (parallelism) for the crawl
maxConcurrency sets the maximum concurrency (parallelism) for the crawl
handleRequestTimeoutSecs is the timeout in which the function passed as handleRequestFunction needs to finish
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
